    General Updates[edit]

    • Captain's Mode second pick phase is changed from Dire / Radiant / Dire / Radiant to Dire / Radiant / Radiant / Dire (assuming Radiant is first pick)
    • Multiple Critical Strike procs are now rolled from strongest to weakest and will stop rolling once a proc occurs (this results in the same DPS but is less lilkely to have multiple crits in a row or multiple attacks without a crit.)
    • Cooldown Percentage Reduction no longer stacks (Sources of flat cooldown reduction still stack)
    • Increased HP Regen of all heroes with 0 HP Regen to 0.25
    • Water Rune healing reduced from 80HP to 40HP
    • Second Roshan no longer drops cheese
    • Neutral Creeps now drop 5 neutral items per tier

    Items[edit]

    Aeon Disk[edit]

    • Bonus HP reduced from 300 to 250
    • Aeon Disk Cooldown increases by 20s every time it triggers up to 165s. Cooldown: 105/125/145/165s

    Abyssal Blade[edit]

    • Bash bonus damage increased from 100 to 120

    Aether Lens[edit]

    • Mana Regeneration bonus reduced from 3.0 to 2.5

    Arcane Blink[edit]

    • Ability Cooldown Reduction increased from 25% to 30%

    Arcane Boots[edit]

    • Replenish Mana mana restored increased from 160 to 175

    Bottle[edit]

    • Health Restored reduced from 115 to 110
    • Mana Restored reduced from 65 to 60
    • Restore time increased from 2.5 to 2.7

    Drum of Endurance[edit]

    • Strength and Intelligence bonuses increased from 6 to 7

    Enchanted Mango[edit]

    • Cost reduced from 70 to 65

    Eul's Scepter of Divinity[edit]

    • Mana Regen reduced from 3.5 to 2.5

    Falcon Blade[edit]

    • Bonus Attack Damage increased from 10 to 12
    • Bonus Health increased from 175 to 200

    Gleipnir[edit]

    • Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
    • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 12 to 14
    • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

    Helm of the Overlord[edit]

    • Reworked Recipe. Now requires Helm of the Dominator, Vladmir's Offering and a 1000 gold recipe (Total cost increased from 6000 to 6050)
    • Bonus Stats reduced from +20 to +8
    • Now can only dominate 1 creep
    • Creep Movement Speed increased from 380 to 400
    • Creep Bonus Attack Damage increased from 25 to 80
    • Creep Bonus Armor increased from 4 to 8
    • Now also grants Vladmir's Aura (+3 armor, +1.75 Mana Regen, +18% damage, +15% Lifesteal in 1200 radius)

    Hurricane Pike[edit]

    • Hurricane Thrust duration increased from 5s to 6s
    • Hurricane Thrust max attacks increased from 4 to 5

    Mage Slayer[edit]

    • Recipe Reworked: Now requires Oblivion Staff + Cloak + 400g Recipe. (total gold cost reduced from 3250 to 2400).

    Grants +20% Magic Resist, 20 damage, 10 Intelligence, 15 attack speed and 2 mana regen

    Rod of Atos[edit]

    • Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
    • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 10 to 12
    • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

    Sange[edit]

    • Status Resistance reduced from 16 to 12

    Sentry Ward[edit]

    • Replenish time decreased from 75 to 70
    • Duration reduced from 8 minutes to 7

    Silver Edge[edit]

    • Recipe Reworked. Now requires Shadow Blade + Crystalys + 350g recipe. (Total cost decreased from 5650 to 5300)
    • Now Grants +60 damage, +40 Attack Speed, and a 30% chance of 160% critical damage.
    • Attacks breaking out of invisibility now deal a guaranteed 160% crit with 175 bonus damage

    Smoke of Deceit[edit]

    • Increased Max Stock from 2 to 3 (Starting stock is still 2)

    Wind Waker[edit]

    • Recipe reduced from 1600 to 1300 (Total cost reduced from 7125 to 6825)

    Witch Blade[edit]

    • Damage per tick reduced from 1x int to 0.75x int
    • Duration increased from 3s to 4s
    • Fixed interaction that caused Witch Blade to give permanent True Strike against magic immune targets

    Neutral Items[edit]

    Faded Broach[edit]

    • Removed item

    Ironwood Tree[edit]

    • Removed item

    Imp Claw[edit]

    • Removed item

    • Removed item

    • Removed item

    Orb of Destruction[edit]

    • Removed item

    Ballista[edit]

    • Removed item

    Pig Pole[edit]

    • New Tier 1 Item
    • Grants +6 to all stats
    • Active: Pig, Out! Turns the owner into a pig for 4 seconds and grants +10% movespeed. Cooldown: 25s. Mana Cost: 50

    Tumbler's Toy[edit]

    • New Tier 1 Item
    • Grants 200 Mana
    • Active: Vault. Propels your unit forward 300 units. CD: 30s
    • Goes on a 3s cooldown when receiving player based damage

    Brigand's Blade[edit]

    • New Tier 2 Item
    • Grants +10 Damage and +10 Attack Speed
    • Passive: Dark Mercy. When attacking an enemy, deals +7 damage for each 10% HP the enemy is missing

    Fae Grenade[edit]

    • New Tier 2 Item
    • Grants +20 Movement Speed
    • Active: Shadow Brand. Throws a Bomb to an enemy within 900 range dealing your attack damage and applying a debuff that provides vision of the unit and deals 20dps for 7 seconds. Cooldown: 20s Mana Cost: 25

    Blast Rig[edit]

    • New Tier 3 Item
    • Grants 8 armor
    • Passive: Hair Trigger. The next time you get attacked by a hero within 300 range, explode dealing 300 damage to all enemies within a 300 radius and applying a 100% blind for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20s

    Ascetic's Cap[edit]

    • New Tier 4 Item
    • Grants 300 Health and 10 Health Regen
    • Passive: Endurance. Whenever a debuff from a player controlled source would be applied to the owner, grant 50% Status resistance for 3 seconds. CD 30s

    Witchbane[edit]

    • New Tier 4 Item
    • Passively causes your hero to deal extra magic damage to its target equal to 4% of its max mana on attack
    • Active: Dispel. Dispels all enemies and allies within 300 radius. Cast Range: 500. Mana Cost: 75. Cooldown: 20s

    Arcanist's Armor[edit]

    • New Tier 5 Item
    • +5 Armor, +20% Magic Resistance
    • Passively grants +5 armor and +20% Magic Resistance to all allies in a 900 radius
    • Active: Mega Shield. Gains a 35% damage reflection aura in a 900 radius affecting allied units for the next 5 seconds. Cooldown:20s (Does not affect illusions)

    Chipped Vest[edit]

    • HP Regen reduced from 5 to 4

    Fairy's Trinket[edit]

    • Bonus Health reduced from 100 to 75

    Possessed Mask[edit]

    • Lifesteal rescaled from 7% to a flat 7HP per attack

    Trusty Shovel[edit]

    • Dig Cooldown reduced from 55 to 50

    Enchanted Quiver[edit]

    • Bonus Damage decreased from 300 to 200
    • Cooldown decreased from 5s to 4

    Ceremonial Robe[edit]

    • Debuff is no longer visible if enemies don't have vision of its holder

    Flicker[edit]

    • Cooldown increased from 4 to 5s
    • Now blinks in place if the owner received damage in the last 3 seconds

    Spider Legs[edit]

    • No longer considered a boot
    • Movement Speed Bonus reduced from 65 to 25

    Stormcrafter[edit]

    • Stormcrafter no longer triggers if the holder is invisible to the target

    Fallen Sky[edit]

    • Cast Range reduced from 1600 to 1200

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Strength from 23 + 3.0 to 22 + 2.8
    • Aphotic Shield cast range increased from 500 to 550
    • Level 20 Talent -15% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +100 Aphotic Shield Health
    • Level 25 Talent +180 Aphotic Shield Health replaced with -1 Curse of Avernus Attacks Required

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Unstable Concoction cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
    • Unstable Concoction mana cost rescaled from 90/100/110/120 to 100
    • Berserk Potion now additionally grants 30 bonus movement speed
    • Level 10 Talent -6s Unstable Concoction Cooldown replaced with +125 Unstable Concoction Radius

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Cold Feet cooldown increased from 10/9/8/7 to 12/11/10/9
    • Ice Blast cooldown increased from 40 to 60/50/40
    • Level 15 Talent +12 HP Regen replaced with +150 Cold Feet Break Distance

    Anti-Mage[edit]

    • Strength Gain increased from 1.3 to 1.6
    • Reworked Shard: Counterspell now also passively grants a 900 range offensive aura reducing enemies' magic damage by 10%. Grants triple the effect to enemies within 300 range
    • Blink Fragment scepter now has 3 charges (25s recharge time)
    • Level 10 Talent +15 Attack Speed replaced with -1s Blink Cooldown
    • Level 15 Talent +8 armor replaced with +0.7s Mana Void Stun
    • Level 20 Talent +1s Mana Void Stun replaced with +250 Blink Cast Range

    Arc Warden[edit]

    • Magnetic Field shard slow increased from 20% to 30%
    • Level 15 Talent +12% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +8 Armor
    • Level 15 Talent + 40 Attack Speed replaced with +40 Magnetic Field Attack Speed
    • Level 20 talent +100 Attack Range replaced with +40 Flux Damage Per second

    Axe[edit]

    • Reworked Shard: Now causes Counter Helix to apply a 6s stacking debuff that reduces attack damage by 20% and increases Counter Helix chance by 10%
    • Level 10 Talent +9 Strength replaced with +12% Magic Resistance
    • Level 15 Talent +300 Health replaced with +30 Counter Helix Damage

    Bane[edit]

    • Brain Sap mana cost decreased from 120/140/160/180 to 100/120/140/160
    • Brain Sap cast range increased from 600 to 625
    • Nightmare now deals 15/20/25/30 Pure damage per second to enemy nightmared targets
    • Fiend's Grip cast Point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2

    Batrider[edit]

    • Sticky Napalm bonus damage increased from 6/12/18/24 to 7/14/21/28
    • Firefly damage rescaled from 10/30/50/70 to 20/35/50/65
    • Firefly cooldown increased from 40/38/36/34 to 46/42/38/34

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Aghanim's Shard Call of the Wild Hawk can now be unit targeted, which will cause the hawk to move in the direction of the target and cast dive when/if in range
    • Call of the Wild Boar attack damage increased from 16/32/48/64 to 20/35/50/65
    • Call of the Wild Hawk vision increased from 600/700/800/900 to 750/800/850/900

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Thirst now heals half the amount on denies
    • Thirst health threshold increased from 75% to 80%
    • Level 10 Talent +7 armor replaced by +10% Bloodrage Spell Amplification
    • Level 15 Talent +15% Lifesteal replaced by +10% HP Rupture Initial Damage

    Bounty Hunter[edit]

    • Shuriken Toss cooldown reduced from 8 to 5
    • Shuriken Toss damage reduced from 150/225/300/375 to 80/120/160/200
    • Shuriken Toss mana cost reduced from 120/125/130/135 to 50/60/70/80
    • Shuriken Toss cast range rescaled from 400 to 375/425/475/525
    • Shuriken Toss scepter no longer reduces cooldown
    • Shuriken Toss scepter cast range increased from 650 to 700
    • Track now also causes Shuriken Toss to deal 1.4/1.7/2.0x damage
    • Jinada can now be toggled to disable autocast.
    • Level 10 Talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +2s Shadow Walk Slow
    • Level 15 Talent +275 Health replaced with 50% Track Bonus Move Speed to allies
    • Level 20 Talent +50 Attack Speed replaced with Track grants ground vision around the target
    • Level 25 Talent 40% Evasion replaced with 2 Shuriken Toss Charges

    Brewmaster[edit]

    • Void Brewling base attack damage reduced from 45-55/65-75/85-95 to 45-55/55-65/65-75
    • Void Brewling base attack time improved from 1.35 to 1.2/1.0/0.8
    • Void Brewling now inherits Brewmaster's Attack Modifiers (e.g: Maelstrom's Chain Lightning, Skadi's Cold Attack, Basher's Bash, etc.)
    • Drunken Brawler passive dodge chance increased from 10/15/20/25% to 15/20/25/30%

    Bristleback[edit]

    • Viscous Nasal Goo base slow reduced from 20% to 15%
    • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter radius reduced from 900 to 800
    • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter max stacks reduced from 8 to 7
    • Warpath stack duration increased from 14 to 16

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Spin Web now grants Broodmother and her spiderlings movement speed based on the health of the unit. (Grants the full amount at 100% health and 0% when the unit is at 20% health or less)
    • Spawn Spiderlings mana cost increased from 100 to 120
    • Spawn Spiderlings damage reduced from 300/370/440 to 240/320/400
    • Reworked Scepter. Vector Targeted. Broodmother creates a 900 width invisible web line that takes 2 seconds to form. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will make it visible and become rooted after 0.25s of 100% slow. They will also be visible in fog and receive 100dps for 4 seconds. Broodmother's team is notified in the Minimap whenever someone trips in a Web line. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until the duration expires, but illusions don't trigger it. Maximum of 5 Snares can be active and Snares can't be cast overlapping another. 2 Charges: Mana Cost: 100. Cooldown: 20s. Cast Range: 600
    • Level 20 Talent +15 Spider Attack Damage replaced with +50% Spiders Damage to buildings

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Hoof Stomp stun duration decreased from 1.7/2.0/2.3/2.6s to 1.6/1.9/2.2/2.5s
    • Stampede damage Strength multiplier increased from 1.5/2.25/3 to 1.75/2.5/3.25
    • Stampede slow duration increased from 2.3s to 2.5s

    Chaos Knight[edit]

    • Strength gain reduced from 3.4 to 3.2
    • Reality Rift cooldown increased from 15/12/9/6 to 18/14/10/6
    • Chaos Strike lifesteal decreased from 25/40/55/70% to 24/36/48/60%
    • Chaos Strike max critical damage increased from 140/170/200/230% to 140/175/210/245%
    • Fixed Strong Illusion buff on Phantasm being dispellable (which would cause illusions to die to illusion killing effects after that)
    • Level 10 talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +200 Reality Rift Target Pull Distance
    • Level 10 talent +5 all stats replaced with +20% Chaos Strike Lifesteal
    • Level 15 talent +35% Cleave replaced with -3s Chaos Bolt Cooldown

    Chen[edit]

    • Divine Favor aura no longer provides Heal Amplification
    • Divine Favor aura now also provides 2/3/4/5 armor
    • Reworked Shard. Allows Holy Persuasion to target 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God level. (Old Scepter effect)
    • Reworked Scepter. Hand of God now applies a Strong Dispel

    Clinkz[edit]

    • Strafe removed
    • New Ability: Burning Barrage
      • Channels for 1.5/1.9/2.3/2.7s shooting 3/4/5/6 piercing arrows in the target direction up to 750/800/850/900 distance away, that hit all enemy units dealing 60% attack damage and applying attack modifiers. Arrow width: 200 Cooldown: 28/24/20/16 Mana Cost: 40/50/60/70
    • Searing Arrows mana cost reduced from 12 to 10
    • Skeleton Walk no longer can cast spells without breaking invisibility
    • Death Pact can be casted from Skeleton Walk without breaking invisibility
    • Level 10 Talent +8 Agility replaced with +12% Magic Resistance
    • Level 15 Talent -7s Skeleton Walk reduced to -5s
    • Level 20 Talent -10s Strafe Cooldown replaced with +2 Burning Barrage Arrows

    Clockwerk[edit]

    • Overclocking bonus movement speed decreased from 40% to 30%
    • Level 10 talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +60 Power Cogs Mana Burn
    • Level 10 talent +5 Armor replaced with -2s Rocket Flare Cooldown

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Base attack speed reduced from 115 to 100.
    • Crystal Nova mana cost reduced from 130/145/160/175 to 115/135/155/175
    • Freezing Field explosion distribution is now more even across its radius
    • Freezing Field shard now also increases total explosions by 20%

    Dark Seer[edit]

    • Fixed Surge self cast behavior not working with AOE Surge talent
    • Wall of Replica duration reduced from 45s to 30s
    • Normal Punch now has True Strike
    • Normal Punch illusion duration increased from 5s to 8s
    • Normal Punch max damage increased from 250 to 300
    • Level 10 Talent +75 Ion Shell Radius replaced with +20% Wall of Replica Illusion Damage
    • Level 15 Talent +25% Wall of Replica Illusion Damage replaced with +75 Ion Shell Radius
    • Level 20 Talent reduced from +60 Ion Shell damage to +50
    • Level 20 Talent increased from -30s Wall of Replica Cooldown to -35s

    Dark Willow[edit]

    • Cursed Crown stun duration reduced from 1.75/2.25/2.75/3.25 to 1.5/2.0/2.5/3.0
    • Level 10 Talent +0.6s Cursed Crown duration reduced to +0.5s
    • Level 20 Talent +50 Damage replaced with +2s Shadow Realm Duration

    Dawnbreaker[edit]

    • Starbreaker no longer ignores movement restriction abilities (e.g: Kinetic Field)
    • Starbreaker no longer gets cancelled if Starbreaker gets rooted, instead just the movement is interrupted.
    • Added Aghanim’s Shard. Grants magic immunity during Starbreaker
    • Added Aghanim’s Scepter. Reduces Solar Guardian Channeling time to 1s. Solar Guardian can be cast again upon takeoff to land early. Solar Guardian now gives allies in the area +60% evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne, increases Heal Per Pulse from 45/70/95 to 60/90/120 and total airborne time by 3.5 seconds
    • Level 10 Talent +7 Strength replaced with +15% Celestial Hammer Slow
    • Level 10 Talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +30 Starbreaker Swipe Damage
    • Level 15 Talent +20 Attack Damage replaced with +40% Luminosity Crit Damage
    • Level 20 Talent +40% Luminosity Crit Damage replaced with -1 Luminosity Attacks Required
    • Level 20 Talent 2 Starbreaker charges replaced with +150 Solar Guardian Radius
    • Level 25 Talent +200 Solar Guardian Radius replaced with 2 Starbreaker Charges

    Dazzle[edit]

    • Base Agility reduced from 21 to 20
    • Poison Touch now only refreshes its duration when Dazzle attacks the target
    • Poison Touch base slow increased from 14/16/18/20 to 16/18/20/22
    • Poison Touch now increases its slow by 2/2.5/3/3.5% every time it's refreshed
    • Shallow Grave mana cost rescaled from 150 to 120/130/140/150
    • Level 15 Talent +225 Heal on Shallow Grave end replaced with +20 Strength
    • Level 20 Talent +30 Movement Speed replaced with +250 Heal on Shallow Grave

    Death Prophet[edit]

    • Base Strength increased from 19 to 21
    • Silence now fires a 1000 speed projectile towards the targeted area and silences units in the AOE upon impact
    • Silence cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2
    • Exorcism cooldown increased from 145 to 150
    • Level 15 Talent +6% Movement Speed replaced with -2s Crypt Swarm Cooldown
